title: Happy Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom Release Day! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.12.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Blessing and Greg chat about Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom and Summer Game Fest's partners... but mostly Zelda.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:33 - Housekeeping
 - Blessing’s first 45 minutes playing Tears of The Kingdom for the first time is up on Youtube right now.
 - On Friday, March 19th we’re celebrating Kev and Mike’s b-day with a special a subathon marathon stream.  We’re gonna get in our PJs, build a fort, and go late if you want it! Come join us for some snacks, games, and sleep over vibes!
      - The Roper Report   -
00:16:53 - Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom is finally out!
00:36:57 - Calling Out Tim
00:41:24 - Geoff Keighley’s announced the Summer Game Fest Partners
00:44:17 - ‘Last of Us’ Season 2 Was Preparing to Audition Actors With Video Game Scenes Due to Writers Strike, but Is Now on Hold
00:48:28 - Hogwarts Legacy for Nintendo Switch has been delayed to November
00:50:25 - Out Today
00:52:39 - You‘re Wrong
00:54:06 - SuperChattin’ w/ KF!
Monday’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
